headline: Weebit Nano (ASX:WBT) Is Up 22.2% After Tier‑1 Licensing And Foundry Qualification Milestones – What's Changed
summary: Weebit Nano recently advanced its commercial rollout by signing licensing agreements for its ReRAM technology with Tier‑1 chipmakers onsemi and Texas Instruments, while also achieving technology qualification at South Korean foundry DB HiTek to support scalable manufacturing and potential volume production. What makes these developments especially important is that Weebit Nano has now paired validation from leading industry customers with a qualified foundry partner, tightening the link...

headline: A Look At ON Semiconductor (ON) Valuation After US$6b Buyback Plan And Upbeat Analyst Sentiment
summary: ON Semiconductor (ON) is back in focus after its board approved a new US$6b share repurchase plan, along with a series of upward revisions to analyst expectations that have put fresh attention on the stock. See our latest analysis for ON Semiconductor. The share price has been edging higher, with a 7 day share price return of 4.63% and a 90 day share price return of 24.37%. The 1 year total shareholder return sits at 12.10%, while the 3 year total shareholder return shows a 14.40% decline...

headline: onsemi to Announce Fourth Quarter and 2025 Annual Financial Results
summary: SCOTTSDALE, Ariz., Jan. 23, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- onsemi (Nasdaq: ON) plans to announce its financial results for the fourth quarter and full year, which ended December 31, 2025, after market closes on Monday, February 9, 2026. The company will host a conference call at 5 p.m. Eastern Time (ET) on February 9, 2026, following the release of its financial results. headline: How Investors Are Reacting To ON Semiconductor (ON) Massive New Buyback And Analyst Reaffirmations
summary: In recent weeks, ON Semiconductor has drawn attention as multiple banks reaffirmed their coverage while the company’s board authorized a US$6.00 billion share repurchase program over three years, underscoring its focus on capital returns alongside investments in power and sensing technologies. This combination of renewed analyst focus and a very large buyback authorization highlights how management is positioning ON Semiconductor around growth areas such as automotive, industrial automation,...
